cc:Work.dc:title: The Hob system for Verifying Data Structure Consistency Properties

text.tspan: Goal: Verify Data Structure Consistency Properties
- Hob framework for modular program analysis
- Enables multiple diverse analyses to interoperate
- Statically verifies data structure consistency properties
want to verify properties for many different kinds of data structures
hard to imagine one analysis that can handle all data structures of interest
want to verify properties which require detailed models of program actions
such properties require expensive analyses; hard to apply to large programs
